data.meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.
data.sentence: The word لِكُلِّ comes from the root ك ل ل and is associated with the meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.

data.meanings: word of interjection, dispraise or threat, woe!
data.sentence: The word وَيْلٌ comes from the root و ي ل and is associated with the meanings: word of interjection, dispraise or threat, woe!

data.meanings: to backbite, defame, push back with a blow, pinch, repel, find fault with, suggest evil, break, throw (on the ground), squeeze, bite.
data.sentence: The word هُمَزَةٍ comes from the root ه م ز and is associated with the meanings: to backbite, defame, push back with a blow, pinch, repel, find fault with, suggest evil, break, throw (on the ground), squeeze, bite.

data.meanings: To wink, make a sign with the eye or hand, defame, reproach, blame, find fault, speak ill, slanderer, strike, repel, traduce. lamaza vb.
data.sentence: The word لُمَزَةٍ comes from the root ل م ز and is associated with the meanings: To wink, make a sign with the eye or hand, defame, reproach, blame, find fault, speak ill, slanderer, strike, repel, traduce. lamaza vb.
